result.purpose: Responsible for defining the client interface and data models for interacting with a waypoint service.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client interactions and data models related to waypoint functionalities.

internal/infras/waypoint/client.go.purpose: Defines a client interface and configuration for interacting with a waypoint service.

internal/infras/waypoint/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for waypoint-related functionalities including error handling, wallet management, and point system.
